# irs.soi

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The `{irs.soi}` package has tools to download, clean and explore with a Shiny App the [IRS SOI Zip Code data](https://www.irs.gov/statistics/soi-tax-stats-individual-income-tax-statistics-zip-code-data-soi) as presented by the NBER [Individual Income Tax Statistics - ZIP Code Data (SOI)](Individual Income Tax Statistics - ZIP Code Data (SOI))

## Installation

The development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("luceydav/irs.soi")
```
